attributes.action: diamond jubilee[ empress of commonwealth] h m Queen
attributes.additional_details: IN 2012 IT WILL BE THE DIAMOND JUBILEE OF H M THE QUEEN WOULDNT IT BE FITTING FROM ALL HER SUBJECTS AND PRIMINISTERS TO CONFER THE TITLE EMPERESS OF THE COMMONWEALTH OR OTHER TOKEN OF GRATTITUDE FOR A MUCH LOVED SOVEREIGN. DISRAILE DID IT FOR QUEEN VICTORIA BUT HAD NEVER SET FOOT ON INDIAN SOIL. AND LETS PUT GREAT BACK INTO GREAT BRITAIN.
